page.title: 12HOME LIFE.
page.content: {OWSTON HOUSEHOLD MANAGEMENT There are no shops in Owston so households have to be self_sufficient, particulary in the winter. Most people go shopping once or twice a week in Oakham, Melton or Leicester, although some tradesmen do call in the village. The milkman comes four times a week, a butcher once, and there is a travelling grocer. Most people grow some vegetables and some keep chickens. All houses have mains water and most households have an electric refrigerator, deep freeze, washing machine and vacuum cleaner, as well as other domestic appliances. One house has a security alarm system. Fire services come from Billesdon, Oakham or Melton. All families have domestic pets. Four families keep horses for riding.
